title: Chapter 4367 - Chapter 4367: 4366, An All-Out War, A War Of The Universe! 5
body:
Chapter 4367 - Chapter 4367: 4366, An All-Out War, A War Of The Universe! 5

Chapter 4367: 4366, an all-out war, a war of the universe! 5

Translator: 549690339

“As long as I can escape to the palace of the Void Dynasty, I’ll be safe there!”

The king of Void could feel that Wang Xian and the rest were chasing after him crazily. He did not dare to stop at all.

He gritted his teeth and roared in his heart.

He did not expect the Dragon King of the Dragon Palace and the rest to be able to travel through the starry skies so far away and arrive here directly.

Now that his heavenly yuan destiny treasure was being suppressed by the Dragon King, he was filled with rage.

However, he had no other choice.

All he could do now was to run for his life.

Once he was caught up, he would be killed again.

If he was resurrected again, his strength would drop to the control level!

As long as he flew to the palace of the dynasty, his subordinates and himself would not be afraid of Wang Xian and the others at all.

In addition, he had already sent a message to his subordinates to rush over quickly!

However, what he did not know was that at this moment, outside the Void Universe, the Army of the nine-origin universe had already rushed in quickly!

“Wu Wu Wu!”

“Wu Wu Wu!”

“Roar Roar Roar!”

Outside the Void Universe, after Wang Immortal’s order was given!

The eyes of all the armies in the nine-origin universe shone with a cold luster.

“In front of us is the Void Universe, the enemy of our nine-origin universe. Today, the disciples of the nine-origin Universe will attack the Void Universe and destroy the Void Dynasty!”

“All the disciples, we have a deep blood feud with the Void Universe. Today, all the disciples, Kill!”

“We will use the blood of the Void Universe to pay tribute to our disciples, seniors, and friends who have died!”

“Kill, Kill, Kill!”

The ancestor of the nether race stared ahead and roared loudly!

A sharp killing intent charged through the entire void!

“Kill, Kill, Kill!”

“Kill, Kill, Kill!”

In the next moment, even the elven empress, the 12 Ancestral Warlocks, and the others raised their hands with killing intent and roared loudly!

The sound of killing shook the sky!

“Let’s Go!”

The Heavenly Yuan creation realm experts shouted at the same time.

They enveloped all their disciples with energy and exploded with energy. They brought all their disciples and charged into the Void universe!

“Front of the Void dynasty, it’s safe!”

“We can teleport!”

At the same time, they were in front of the Legion in the 9-origin universe!

An lie stood there and walked out from a devil spirit altar!

Since he wanted to kill them!

Then he would catch the void space by surprise!

And to catch them by surprise, he naturally went straight to the palace of the Void dynasty!

Under an Lie’s constant inspection, he confirmed a place!

After dozens of minutes, the disciples of the 9-origin universe rushed into the void space!

An lie looked at them. “Teleport!”

“Okay!”

The Heavenly Yuan creation realm experts of the nine-origin universe nodded.

“Hehe, our Dragon Palace will scout the way for You!”

Bei Shuang smiled and Xiao Lan and the others approached an lie. Under an Lie’s lead, they instantly disappeared!

However, in less than a second, an Lie’s figure appeared again.

Legions of the nine-origin universe were teleported one after another!

Legions of the 9-essences universe appeared in front of the palace of the Void dynasty.

They appeared in the void, and from afar, they could see the towering palace of the Void dynasty!

“Is that the palace of the Void Dynasty?”

The Unity Saint asked with a cold and excited look in his eyes.

“Yes, that’s the palace of the Void Dynasty!”

The 12 ancestral warlocks came here and nodded as they looked at the palaces in front of them.

“Then destroy the palace of the Void Dynasty!”

Saint Hetian roared with a fierce killing intent!

“Kill!”

The powerful disciples of the saint’s bloodline were filled with flames of hatred.

Many of their brothers, sisters, and seniors had died at the hands of the Void King.

Now, it was time for them to take revenge!

Boom! Boom

Boom! Boom! Boom

“Kill!”

The sky-high Aura broke through the clouds of the Void Space!

That terrifying aura could be felt even from the palace of the Void Space Dynasty!

The Army of the 9-origin universe rushed over!

“What’s going on?”

“Where is that? What a powerful aura!”

At the same time, in the palace of the Void dynasty!

Today was a very bad day for the Void Dynasty.

Their void King had been attacked by a great being of the 9-origin universe.

In addition, three great beings of the control level of the Void Universe had just been resurrected in the Void dynasty!

They had received news from the void King and were going to help their king!

However, before they could leave, a terrifying aura came from not far away.

Looking at that monstrous aura, the seven Tianyuan blessed realm experts in the palace of the Void dynasty were instantly stunned!

At the same time, the disciples in the Palace of the Void dynasty also instantly felt the powerful aura coming from the north.

They all looked over with their mouths agape.

That terrifying aura was like a destructive sun that was charging towards them!

“Use the formation to investigate!”

Duke Tian men, who had been guarding the Palace of the Void Empire, saw the terrifying aura coming from the north and his expression changed drastically.

He immediately activated the formation of the entire Palace of the Void Empire to carry out the projection and investigate!

Soon, the projection of the Army of the nine-origin universe in the north appeared in the line of sight of the heavenly yuan destiny realm experts.

When they saw the enormous space beast.

When they saw the terrifying divine dragon!

When they saw the black tortoise, the ELF, the Divine Tiger, the ghost, the skeleton, the wizard… Their faces were filled with shock.

They naturally understood the creatures of the nine-origin universe very well!

Now, when they saw the army of the nine-origin universe rushing over, their faces were filled with disbelief!

“It’s the nine-origin universe, it’s the disciples of the nine-origin universe. How did they suddenly appear in our universe?”

A Heavenly Yuan creation realm powerhouse roared with a solemn expression!

“Weng!”

Duke Tianmen waved his arm and streams of energy poured into the array formation in the palace.

Following that, some information appeared.

When they saw this information, their expressions changed drastically!

“More than 20 heaven origin creation realm experts, how is this possible! ?”

Duke Tian men stared at the information and shouted!

“More than 20 heaven origin creation realm experts, this 9-origin universe has definitely invited experts from other universes. Our king has been attacked, and now the 9-origin universe has invaded. Their 9-origin universe is already prepared to fight us!”

“They came prepared, they came prepared!”

A Heaven origin creation realm expert roared in shock and anger!

“Immediately pass the news to our king. We can’t rush over immediately!”

The golden-armored middle-aged heaven origin creation realm expert said with an ugly expression.

They looked at the 9-origin universe army in front of them, and their expressions kept changing.

The nine-origin universe was coming.

They were coming to their universe.

They had to fight.

Otherwise, everything they had would be over.

Because the great beings of the nine-origin universe had already come, and they could escape. What about the disciples of the Void Dynasty?

What about their descendants?

Escape today?

What about in the future?
